title: Broadcom Acquisition Hurts Stock, Trade War Impacting Economy, Media M&A Moves
itunes:title: Broadcom Acquisition Hurts Stock, Trade War Impacting Economy, Media M&A Moves
description:
Carol is joined by Nico Grant, Bloomberg News Tech Reporter, and Cody Acree, Analyst at Loop Capital, to discuss Broadcom taking a hit for acquisition of CA Technologies for $18.9 billion. Frances Donald, Head of Macro Economic Strategy at Manulife Asset Management, talks about why trade tensions are now becoming economically important. Greg Portell, Partner at A.T. Kearney, breaks down media mergers news, including Disney and Comcast fighting for Fox. Julie Verhage, Bloomberg News Fintech Reporter, and Eric Newcomer, Bloomberg News Startup Reporter, explain that Uber is now accepting Venmo payments from riders. And we Drive to the Close with Eric Clark, Portfolio Manager at Accuvest Global Advisors. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
